job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Machine Learning Engineer </strong></p><p><strong> </strong></p><p>We are a Boston-based MIT spinout that are pioneering within AI Acceleration, photonics, Machine Learning, and optics space. We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Mandarin, Deep Learning)&nbsp;to come and help solidify the hardware vision of what we are building.</p><p><strong> </strong></p><p><br></p><p>As a Machine Learning Engineer, you must fluent in Mandarin, you should ideally have a background or knowledge of digital microarchitecture design, logic, simulation, AI acceleration, or general experience in the semiconductor industry. The ideal candidate will also have strong engineering skills with C++ or Python experience. The mandarin component is a necessity as you will be interfacing with their team that is in China.</p><p><br></p><p>We are in a period of rapid growth. This is an opportunity for an ML Engineer to join us at a relatively early stage and apply your skills in a brand-new area of technology that has never been attempted before. If you have experience You will be working on lower-level implementation of deep learning kernels, graph compilers, or training systems this may be the opportunity for you!</p><p><strong> </strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>What we can offer:</strong></p><ul><li>An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day computing as we know it.</li><li>A culture of openness and collaboration – we are all working together under a shared vision.</li><li>A great location in downtown Boston</li><li>Excellent benefits.</li></ul><p><strong> </strong></p><p><br></p><p><em>Key skills include: Machine Learning, Machine Learning Engineer, Software Engineer, Programmer, Programming, Engineering, Python, C++, Mandarin, Deep Learning, Deep Learning Kernels, Training Systems, Machine Learning Models, Algorithm Development, Artificial Intelligence</em></p>
